# Hinton Workspace

> A unique co-working environment for entrepreneurs and professionals in North Dorset, UK.

## About

Hinton Workspace is a transformed former carpenter's workshop in Hinton St Mary, North Dorset. We offer co-working spaces, meeting rooms, and event space for professionals seeking focus, flexibility, and community.

## Location

The Building Yard, Hinton St Mary
Sturminster Newton, Dorset
DT10 1NA, United Kingdom

## Contact

- Phone: 01258 472 623
- Email: reception@hintonworkspace.co.uk
- Website: https://hintonworkspace.co.uk

## Services

### Co-Working
Flexible hot-desking and dedicated desk options with natural light, high-speed WiFi, soundproof pods, breakout areas, and a fully equipped kitchen.

### Meeting Rooms
Professional meeting rooms for hire, accommodating 2-30 people with video conferencing facilities.

### Event Space
Versatile space for off-sites, workshops, and networking events, accommodating up to 100 guests.

## Facilities

- High-speed WiFi
- Fully equipped kitchen with tea and coffee
- Manned reception (08:30-17:00 Monday-Friday)
- Electric vehicle charging
- Dog friendly
- Soundproof quiet pods
- Free parking

## Opening Hours

Monday - Friday: 08:00 - 18:00
Saturday - Sunday: Closed

## Booking

Book online at: https://hintonworkspace.spacebring.com/
